Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Fox f
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Foxborough for 8 days after another hotel lost our reservations. When we checked in, the front desk staff were very helpful and understanding. Everyone went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and well taken care of. We were so pleased that we extended our stay an extra day. We will be back and will stay at the Foxborough again. Thank you for making us feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Little man's FAVORITE!”
Reviews.Author: Theresejc8
Reviews.Content: I took my 5 year old grandson to Branson to see show and all he wanted to do was "go back to 'our house.'" That's what he called our suite @ Foxborough! It was decorated beautifully, was immaculate and very comfortable. The staff was courteous and helpful. They also provided very good discount on show tickets. I have highly recommended this resort to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome awesome”
Reviews.Author: Dalton2012
Reviews.Content: Very nice place clean pool and nicely redecorated rooms. We stayed in a 2bedroom condo we'll be back! !

Reviews.Title: “Condo Stay”
Reviews.Author: bransonfreak
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed for a week long stay while our children has sports events. We were greeted with the nicest people at the front desk staff and the condo was very nice and at a great price. The pool was extremely clean and all the staff we came in contact with was very helpful and informative. This was a great time for my family, I am looking forward to returning. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Beware of Bedbugs”
Reviews.Author: bookworm669
Reviews.Content: This hotel doesn't even deserve 1 star. This hotel was booked thru Trips Incentives thru the Branson Reservation Center Walnut Shade, MO for a presentation of a timeshare. We checked in the hotel & went to the room. The bathroom door was half stripped of its paint. It smelled really bad & we turned down the bedspread & there was a bedbug. The sheets were also dirty & stained. We immediately went & checked out & told the employee behind the desk why we were checking out & she didn't seem surprised.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks!”
Reviews.Author: sunshine55ok
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the Foxborough Resort for the past couple of years and have always traveled on a vacation package. I'm really not sure why the other guest had so much trouble with his stay. I just used one of my Resort Marketing packages and stayed at the Foxborough. Everything was set and waiting for me when we checked in. My theater tickets were all reserved so I didn't have to make any reservations myself. The folks at the desk we very pleasant and friendly. My condo was very clean and comfortable. I have another package with Resort Marketing and look forward to using it in the fall or Christmas time. If Resort Marketing is owned by Foxborough I would just like to say, well done! Look forward to seeing you again!

Reviews.Title: “Dive! Dive! Dive!”
Reviews.Author: masonman32
Reviews.Content: Can't say much more than that. This place sucks and the management does not care. Dirty stinky rooms that smell like urine. Just Gross stay far away from this place.

Reviews.Title: “Value price, good location”
Reviews.Author: Steve V
Reviews.Content: Clean room (#108). Off-Strip location made traveling around town easier. Don't expect $200 per night amenities, but nothing was unacceptable. If you want paintings, go to a museum. TV wasn't flat screen, but channel selection was good. Shower wasn't good for tall people, but that's a design flaw, not a quality issue. Bed was comfortable, pillows were good. I don't understand all the negative reviews; must have been a bad week for the staff or some REALLY picky people. We found all staff members friendly and helpful. Housekeeping could have paid a little more attention to detail, but no major problems.

Reviews.Title: “Worst motel stay in 17 years”
Reviews.Author: Rick W
Reviews.Content: We were booked into this motel by Resort Marketing Service. Room was very dark even after turning all the lights on. Checked the bed and bedding showed a lot of wear, stained, comforters looked like they had makeup on them. The mattresses were worn out, pillows were also flat. Wednesday morning we showered (the shower in our room would be good for Snow Whites entourage, the 7 dwarfs) and got ready for the day, we loaded all of our stuff as we were only staying one more night. We were gone all day and went to an afternoon show as well as an evening one and when we returned for our final night, garbage had been removed, one had no liner put back in, bathroom light and fan were on couldn't tell if they really cleaned anything and we had no hand towels, wash cloths, or bath towels. Went to the front desk told her there were no towels in our room asked for and was given them they were the smallest bath towels I had ever seen and you could barely dry your self with them. IF SOMEONE WANTS YOU TO STAY HERE DO NOT WALK AWAY, RUN AS FAST AS YOU CAN!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Neat place to stay”
Reviews.Author: aintlookin
Reviews.Content: This resort is the nicest one in Branson year after year my family stays here and my children have grown and started their own familys and we meet here every year for our family reunion. The carpets are clean and fresh and bathrooms are always clean and make us feel like we are staying in our own home. we love the exercise room and outdoor picnic tables with BBQ grills. just a wonderful place thanks and keep up the great work.

Reviews.Title: “WOW TALK ABOUT A GREAT PLACE”
Reviews.Author: David C
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just woke up to a great nights sleep and a huge breakfast right here on the resort !!!! FREE WIFI and clean room with a fridge and microwave !! We are so impressed with the staff and the fact that they even have discounts on show tickets and don't have to take a timeshare presentation. This is impressive !!!!!! We highly recommend this place to anyone that is looking for a beautiful resort and an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: “More trouble than it was worth”
Reviews.Author: Nancy F
Reviews.Content: This motel and staff where a nightmare. We had reservation for a two bedroom condo 1 king/2 queen bed. When we got to our room only had two king beds and the carpet was filthy. Called front desk and was told they had no other rooms so we decided we would make it work, but immediately went to turn on air on one was broke. Called back to from desk and due to the warm temperature told her it. Need fixed ASAP due to a small infant with us. Out of nowhere she had another room we could move to....when we got there it was torn apart and in the middle of being clean. Went back personally to front desk to get issue resolved so after a call to the GM she put is in another room. Third times a charm room had the 1 king/2 queen like we had requested and was clean. We will never stay here again and only did because of the package deal we had received. Towels were a joke and What I would use at home as a rag.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting and Smelly”
Reviews.Author: travelinnurse01
Reviews.Content: Hotel was disgusting and smelled like a wet dog. Carpet was filthy with animal stains, matresses were caved in, and linens were dirty. When brought to managers attention, no remedy was offered. Would definitely not recommend staying here!! Very small pool located next to the road.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible - will NEVER return”
Reviews.Author: Jane E
Reviews.Content: Was told by Branson Tourism Center that this was newly remodeled, new furniture family suite. Sofa was filthy, mattress on bed squeaked. All needed to be sent to Goodwill. Flat screen t.v. was not mounted on wall, sitting on table with cables hanging down. Towels were thin and thread bare. Shower head was o.k. for a midget, plus it leaked. Picture on web site is NOTHING like the room. No pictures on wall, no lamps on tables. Don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: “great staff very friendly and went out of their way for us”
Reviews.Author: fourwheelin
Reviews.Content: We were down there for a motorcycle rally and they went out of their way for us all. They were very friendly and good breakfast. They worked around us so if we were there during the time they would normally clean our room then they would come back when we were leaving to clean and gave us extra towels and bedding whatever we asked for. Staff was very friendly and especially the owners they were right there all the time and were very friendly and great. We stayed in a condo and Loved it. WOULD & WILL STAY AGAIN EVERYTIME WE COME TO BRANSON!!! They let us all park under the canopy to keep our bikes dry!!!!

Reviews.Title: “stayed 2 days, charged for 3”
Reviews.Author: akg313
Reviews.Content: We decided to check out a day early (on a Sunday) due to the weather forcast. There was no one at the front desk on Sunday. My husband used the phone outside and was told to leave the room keys and his name, but the hotel would not be able to provide/obtain a receipt due to no one available. (This was around 8:00 am.). We went out for breakfast, and stopped back afterwards and found the office still locked. We just got our credit card bill and discovered we had been charged for all three days. We called Foxborough Inn and was informed that the general manager would call us the following day. Needless to say, he did not call and the receptionist was less than cordial about the issue. We are still trying to get our money back and it looks like we will need to contact the credit card company to settle the dispute.

Reviews.Title: “Don't leave anything behind and expect to get it back when you return.”
Reviews.Author: tkelly3
Reviews.Content: People seemed really nice and rooms were OK. However, we left and checked out before realizing we had left 2 bottles of unopened wine in a drawer. We returned to get them within about an hour and they were missing. Seems the maid had already cleaned the room and had no idea where they were. Office said they would contact the maid again or at least make it right. They never got in touch with us again. We called and sent a letter and received no response. If you leave anything in the room, you can expect the cleaning people to claim it as their own and the management really doesn't seem to care. Even though we go to Branson at least 3-4 times a year, we won't be going back to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good experience”
Reviews.Author: kevinmarkbwc
Reviews.Content: You never know how places in Branson will turn out, but Foxborough performed very well for us. Room was clean, new paint, fairly new carpet (shag), bathroom was clean as well and bed was pretty good. The staff was very helpful and accomodating and the pool was very nice. Breakfast met our needs as well, I like biscuits & gravy. My wife and I were very pleased, especially with the value.

Reviews.Title: “2nd time is still a charm!”
Reviews.Author: travelingduo_10
Reviews.Content: THis is the second time we have stayed here. The staff is wonderful. The maids missed our room and when we brought it to their attention the head housekeeper came to our room and cleaned it for us with a SMILE on her face apologizing for the maid missing us! The breakfast is awesome and well stocked. and when we wanted to stay an extra night beyond our reservation we were treated like family!! I will always go back here for my stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the cool and pristine pool!”
Reviews.Author: Bransonlover-10
Reviews.Content: This is the second year in a row that we have vacationed in Branson and stayed at the Foxborough Inn and Suites. A very good value. The rooms were clean and tended to daily. We spent alot of time in the refreshing pool. We even thanked the man that cleaned the pool for his attention to great cleanliness. The sign said the pool hours are 10 am to 10 pm. but the man had cleaned the pool by 8 am and we were allowed to swim then.I have read some negative reviews, but it seems like in both cases the people writing the reviews were bent on negativity and nothing any hotel could do would change their outlook on life in general. The service at the front desk was amiable and the maids were generous with fresh towels upon request. We will plan on staying there every time we come to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks from Oklahoma Heat Softball”
Reviews.Author: jabsmom24
Reviews.Content: Our week long stay was very pleasant. We had excellent service and if any problems came up, they were dealt with quickly. The staff was very friendly and was always willing to help. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The location was perfect for our group, we were located within 2 miles of the Branson Rec Plex and the Branson Stockstill Park, and easy access to all attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay- we will come back again”
Reviews.Author: travelingduo_10
Reviews.Content: We did not find problems as in the previous reviews maybe they had personal issues. The staff was very pleasant, the rooms were very clean, the location is a little off the beaten path but in Branson's busy season this would be an asset. The only minor problem was the soda and ice machine was out of order. They were remodeling at the time we came but we were never inconvenienced. You would like it if you stayed here.

Reviews.Title: “WORST PLACE TO STAY, WATCH OUT THEY WILL LIE ABOUT YOU!”
Reviews.Author: rmjones777
Reviews.Content: We stayed there because we we in town for a job interview. We ended up having to wait for 3 weeks to har back from the job. The first condo we stayed in was infested with fleas and our dogs got fleas in the middle of the snowy winter. We told the office about it nicley and asked if we could move into another condo because we had just went out and spent the money for front line and cap star to get rid of the fleas and we wanted to make sure they would not get them again. Well someon there went to the owner and told him a BIG FAT LIE saying that we wanted to SUE the hotel because our dogs got fleas. Then because the owner was part of the place that we had applied for a job, we were told he went right into the board meeting of the CHURCH Ministry and told them that we had threatened to sue the hotel because of fleas. When we had NEVER and would NEVER even say that. I mean come on, we WERE STILL STAYING THERE! DUH! So needless to say we were JUDGED by heresay ad not even asked if it was the truth. Plus all the places we stayed stunk. The lady tat was the maid told us all about how her husband was a drug addict adshe had to watch him all the time and that THEY CLEANED THE ROOMS. I would watch it staying there after what all we went through. We are in the process of reporting them to the BBB.

Reviews.Title: “What has customer service come too?”
Reviews.Author: Pepper36
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend staying here if you tend to leave things behind on your trips. You will find a staff that will promise one thing and then take no responsible in the end. You will find a staff that tends to take personal items as their own, even after you claim the item and tell the front desk personal you will be in to pick your lost item up only to find that they don’t know what happen to you item. They will then tell you it’s not their fault and tell you to get the [--] out of there. Real nice professional staff they like to keep around.

HotelInfo.Name: Foxborough Inn & Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 235 Expressway Lane, Branson, MO 65616
